title: New Ornn Theme Violin & Voice Cover

embed.description: Facebook: http://facebook.com/J3nnPK Twitter: http://twitter.com/J3nnPK @J3nnPK Instagram: http://instagram.com/J3nnPK @J3nnPK Original Video in Ancient Frejlordian https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e47AEBnu9SQ&t=5s Lyrics: Dark smoke exhales, from the mountain half And wind blows through hollow dells Skies clear as day, shall soon turn gray And you'll know, you're nearing Ornn Barring your path is a chasm wide Howls

body: I just wanted to share a cover I just made of the Ornn theme. Riot always comes out with the most amazing champion themes, so I had a lot of fun making this one, and hope you do too watching it ^_^ ❤️ ❤️ ❤️

replies.body:
Wonderful cover & thanks for sharing! I love the fact that you took the time to create this; it really made my day :)

We always try our hardest to create the best music we possibly can & seeing/hearing a video like this is truly special.

> [{quoted}](name=Talondor,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=4ZksQiUF,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-08-10T17:06:04.662+0000)
>
> Wonderful cover & thanks for sharing! I love the fact that you took the time to create this; it really made my day :)
> 
> We always try our hardest to create the best music we possibly can & seeing/hearing a video like this is truly special.

Do you main talon?{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

Heh, I enjoy playing him, but my main (soon) will be Ornn! My SN is based off an old dragon in the original EverQuest named Talendor. That was the most influential game that got me into both games & music. Interestingly enough, I never even saw or battled with the dragon in the game, I just heard of his myth/legend & thought the name was cool. So ever since then every RPG character I've made has some kind of spelling similar to 'Talendor'.
https://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/starcraft/images/7/7d/Talandar_SC2-LotV_Head2.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/328?cb=20151206090434
Will you please just please give me the the chords for violin

Wohoo ! That is really cool.

Lore + music + players = yes

Respect , applaud and thumbs up! 

very well done. ^-^
Absolutely adorable! I love Ornn's little poem!

sweet voice, slays strings, good editing...
...<3<3<3

More Please.
Holy moly this is really good! {{sticker:sg-kiko}}
Would be better with your real eye colour and hair

...
How can you be certain her eyes aren't blue/green?  She could be Uzbek, Kirghiz, Kazakh, Uighur, etc.  She could also be part European for all you know.  The ancient Chinese recorded green-eyed and red-haired people in north-western China more than two thousand years ago.  Light eyes are rare in people with typical east asian features but it's not unheard of.

Also, even if they are contacts, what is it to you?  You might as well complain that she's singing a clearly northern-European inspired song or that she plays a European instrument.  It's her choice if she wants to dress up to fit the song's theme.  White people don't accuse other people of appropriating our culture...  That's not our way.  If people of different backgrounds enjoy our culture or even want to emulate our features, they are welcome to do so.  It doesn't even slightly offend me.  We are proud of our culture and want to share it with the world.  I am honored that she has chosen to take an interest in European culture, even if it is via a fictional game-universe version.

Because I'm not legally retarded, and understand genetics on a level most civilians can only dream of. Clearly you can see her hair is dyed, also the contacts are bluish grey. Very rare eye color with its genetics tied to Turkish decent.
